changes_made.old_text: This reconstruction approach is standard when individual patient data are unavailable (4,5) and has been validated in previous retrospective studies (6).
changes_made.new_text: This reconstruction approach is standard when individual patient data are unavailable (4,5) and has been validated for oncology clinical trials using synthetic data proxies (6).

El Emam K, Mosquera L, Zheng M, Pilote L, Azizi Z. Can synthetic data be a proxy for real clinical trial data? A validation study. *BMJ Open*. 2021;11(4):e043497. PMID: 33863713. DOI: 10.1136/bmjopen-2020-043497.
